Next Steps to Fix Blank Page:

  1. Check Browser Console
    • Press F12 to open Developer Tools
    • Go to the "Console" tab
    • Look for any red error messages
    • Check if JS/CSS files are loading (404 errors)
  2. Check Network Tab
    • In Developer Tools, go to "Network" tab
    • Reload the page
    • Look for failed requests (red items)
    • Verify index.html, JS, and CSS files load successfully
  3. Common IONOS Issues
    • 404 on /assets/* files - .htaccess not working
    • MIME type errors - Missing AddType directives
    • Blank page with no errors - React not mounting

Files to Check:

  • index.html should load
  • /assets/index-[hash].js should load
  • /assets/index-[hash].css should load
  • .htaccess should be present in root

After checking: If assets are 404, the .htaccess isn't working. If assets load but page is blank, check console for React errors.
